Articles.Content:
So I went on the KSP forums at about 6:20 this morning for the first time today. But when I went to like something, it said that I "can't give more than 25 likes in a day."

What?

This is the first time I've been on here all day. I haven't liked anything else (except maybe one thing I might have forgotten about). But is this a bug in the forums?
Looked at your reputation activity, you went on a bit of a rep-giving bender 22 hours ago. My guess would be that in another couple of hours you'll be able to rep again.
